snippet: The body of the former Philippine dictator Ferdinand Marcos will remain for now in its refrigerated crypt in the northern Philippines.
lead_paragraph: The body of the former Philippine dictator Ferdinand Marcos will remain for now in its refrigerated crypt in the northern Philippines.

headline.main: Philippines: Dictator Is Denied Burial Honors
headline.print_headline: Philippines: Dictator Is Denied Burial Honors
headline.seo: Ferdinand Marcos Is Denied Burial Honors
